name: Efemeris - DTDA Games
description:
Efemeris is an online boardgame dedicated to 2 players, select your nation, captains and crew members and explore the Celestial Vault!

During your turn you have 4 phases to execute:
- Exploring plhase
- Collecting phase
- Tactical phase
- Construciton phase

The first nation who conquer 5 planets, win the game instantatly!
You can play online against the world or against CPU, start a party, join the lobby and conquer the Celestial Vault!
